args: (Garuda... At one point, she wanted me\nas a sacrifice.)
(She did some bad things, but only\n'cause she was lonely. She's actually\na really kind dragon.)
(She protected our village for a long time,\nand that's when we became friends!)
That is the harvest festival held in autumn,\nyes? I recall it being a popular occasion\nin the village.
You got it! So, um, I was thinking this year,\nyou and I could maybe...
You would see us celebrate Halloween\ntogether?
Heh. Your face does not hide much.
And thinking on it now, I realize I only\never observed the village's festivities\nfrom atop my cliff.
Exactly! So we should totally do Halloween\ntogether this year. We're friends, after all!
Thank you, Lowen.\nLet us do that.
However, I must be away. When the leaves\nturn to crimson, I shall return.
Huh? You have to go somewhere?
Worry not, Lowen. I shall return by\nHalloween; on that you have my word.
(It's almost Halloween, but there's no\nsign of Garuda...)
(Did something happen maybe? Oh gosh,\nwas she attacked by fiends?!)
(No. Garuda is strong. But then...why isn't\nshe back yet?)
You look deep in thought, Lowen.\nIs something wrong?
Uh huh. Go on, tell me what's worrying\nyou.
I-I... Aww, how did you know?

It's written across your face in big bold
letters: ＂Current status: WORRIED BEYOND
REASON.＂ Now, tell me what's on your
mind.
Um, well... Do you think Garuda's gonna\nmake it back for Halloween?
We promised to spend Halloween together.
She said she'd be back when the leaves\nturned red, but they're all done changing\nand she's still gone...
I was thinking she might've been\nattacked by fiends, or maybe she\ngot a cold or something...
Or maybe I scared her when I said\nI wanted to spend Halloween together...
Oh Lowen, sweetie. It'll be okay.
The wind is carrying your feelings.\nThere's no way Garuda could miss them.
Hey, here's an idea: I'll make you a\nHalloween costume!
You can look forward to wearing it around\nwith Garuda. How does that sound?
That way, even if Garuda isn't back until\njust before the fun starts, you can get\nstarted right away.
(You'll be back in time, right Garuda?\nYeah. I know you will. You promised...)
Ha ha, look! I've got feathers on my head!\nAnd a big long tail!
N-no, I look cool! I'm just like the prankster\nfiend from my book!
That's right. I know how much you like\nthat book, so I did my best to recreate\nthe look.
Thank you so much, Louise! This is the\nbest costume EVER.
I feel like a whole new me!
Yes, I'm sure Garuda will be quite\nsurprised by your new look.
Hey Louise, could you lend me a hand?\nThis is a bit much for one person to carry...
That's all right Lowen, I can handle it.\nYou stay here and enjoy yourself.
Kids should have all the fun they can\non Halloween.
But...what's the point in having fun\nall by myself?
Garuda's still not back... Are my prayers\nnot reaching her? Hm... Oh, what's that?
Do the two of you promise to behave\nyourselves from here on?
Honestly, you're both much too old for such\nchicanery. Halloween or not, you should\nnot be snatching food.
All right already, ya made yer point!\nNot that it'll stick...
Heh, you just wait for our NEXT prank,\nCleo! It's gonna be a doozy!
Now wait just one moment!\nYou can't escape me, you know!
If you even THINK of pulling another\nprank, I'll be there in a flash to stop you!
Ha ha, Ranzal and Luca are so funny.\nI wonder though...can Cleo really sense\nwhen pranks are being pulled?
Maybe if I do a few pranks, Garuda would\nshow up to scold ME?
Wait, no, I can't! Cleo would be mad.
Buuuut... If it brings Garuda back in time...
I mean, it IS Halloween, and I AM dressed\nup like a prankster fiend, so...maybe it's\nfine?
Yeah! I'm gonna do my very best to be a\nnaughty boy today!
Goodness, you're certainly excited for\nHalloween, Lowen. What was it you\nsaid you would be doing?
I'm gonna be a naughty boy and pull tons\nof awesome pranks!
I-I mean... Forget what I just said!\nI'm just sooooo excited for Halloween,\nyou know? Ha ha...
Ugh, that was such a dummy move!\nWhat kind of prankster goes around\ntelling people the truth like that?!
All right. From this moment on,\nI'm not gonna let anything slip.\nI'm a bad boy! The BADDEST!
I've never been bad before, though...\nCan I really do this?
Well, I guess we'll see. Here I come,\nHalloween!
